Articles.Content:
So recently I opened up KSP after about 2 months of not playing.

I think the version is 1.12.2.3something. When I opened the game there was a loading screen for Unity. I can only assume that this was an update to unity engine.

However, since opening, the game has become unbearably slow. It’s  probably running at about 1-2 fps. I lowered the scatter density and quality as well as the render and texture quality. This seemed to help. However, the problem still persists when launching planes from the runway.

I play on my laptop and until now the game has always run fairly well on ultra shaders and the highest render setting with roughly 80% scatter density and default quality terrain.

Is there a way to fix this issue?

Any mods?

Vid card drivers up to date?

Logs? Excessively low FPS is often caused by severe exception spam which slows the game to a crawl but doesn’t usually cause it to crash- the logs will show if that’s the case.

Back up your saves (copy the folders inside KSP/saves to your desktop) then completely uninstall and reinstall the game and see if that helps.
